::Liono::
Liono eyes grow wide as he thinks for a moment. "Your here about the time 
disruptions?" Liono's tone changes and grows a little more offensive as he 
uncross his arms. "I'm Liono guardian of the Ark and one of three Matrix 
masters. Cybertron should be grateful that they haven't suffered anymore 
than they have. The Maximals squabble like perpetual children and are sorely 
out numbers if you want to help join them." Liono touches his braces and 
feels the surge of power. "How do I know your not armed or setting some trap 
after all your not maximals so your word is worthless and honor is just as 
fleeting as a spring rain."
